version_description: 1. Bug fixed.

Update Contents
1. Added new Valkyrie Yae Sakura and her [Gyakushinn Miko] and [Goushinnso Momento] battlesuits
2. New Open World gamemode - [Sakura Samsara]
3. New event - [Nine Realms Sanctuary]
4. Added a new batch of weapons and stigmata

1. Added new Theresa Apocalypse Valkyries: [Valkyrie Pledge] and [Violet Executor].
2. Added new [Everlasting Memory] Extra Chapter.
3. Added Faction War game mode.
4. Added Valkyrie swimsuit costumes.
5. Added a new batch of weapons and stigmata.

1. All new Dorm system
2. New Valkyries have joined the fight: Black Nucleus and Wolf’s Dawn.
3. Added extra stages for Bronya: Dilemma Dreamland.
4. Chapter 5 story released.
5. Added the final stage for Final HOMU Fantasy.
6. Added a new batch of weapons and stigmata.

1. New characters joining the Honkai War: Celestial Hymn and Flame Sakitama
2. Chapter 6 story released
3. All-new Divine Key system
4. New Co-op Raid stages
5. Added a new batch of weapons and stigmata.

1. Fu Hua's A-rank battlesuit [Night Squire] and Kallen's S-rank battlesuit [Sixth Serenade] are ready for battle!
2. Chapter 8 updated: Battle of Schicksal is finally on!
3. Valkyrie Chronicles available
4. New weapons and stigmata.
5. German and French versions of the game are now available!

1. New Valkyries [Shadow Knight] and [Luna Kindred] are ready for battle!
2. Brand New Open World: Schicksal HQ.
3. Gorgeously-overhauled story chapters to re-ignite your passion!
4. Dimension Treasures are unlocked.

1. New battlesuits: Vermilion Knight: Eclipse and Umbral Rose
2. New event: Anniversary Parade is now on Tons of login bonuses!
3. New adventure: Fairytale Rhapsody, a surreal journey to the Outworld
4. New challenge: Dirac Sea. Show no mercy!
5. New story: New Chapter released. Let the final conflagration begin!

1. [Herrscher of the Void] and [Arctic Kriegsmesser] ready for battle
2. Valentine's Day Event: [Sweet Memories] is now on
3. Lunar New Year Event is now on

1. New battlesuits: Vermilion Knight: Eclipse and Umbral Rose
2. New event: Anniversary Parade is now on Tons of login bonuses!
3. New adventure: Fairytale Rhapsody, a surreal journey to the Outworld
4. New challenge: Dirac Sea. Show no mercy!
5. New story: New Chapter released. Let the final conflagration begin!

[Battlesuit] Augmented battlesuit - Twilight Paladin activated
[Storyline] Story Chapter XII: Plain of Vigrid released
[Event] Ready yourself for the St. Freya Fiesta
[System] All-new PRI-ARMs and sweet bonuses
[Equipment] Weapons Hekate's Gloom, ARC Serratus & stigmata set Kafka available

[New SP Battlesuit | Darkbolt Jonin]
[Winter Event | Sanka Saga]
[Story Chapter XIV | Dispel the Darkness]
[Equipment Update]

Особенности v3.2:
[Новый Персонаж] Зеле Фёллерай: Новая Валькирия квантового типа.
[Продолжение Истории] Глава XI: Морская Бездна.
[Пополнение ELF] Элегия Селунэ: Элегантная фея холода.
[Новый Вызов] Q-Сингулярность: Исследуйте зияющую пропасть Квантового Пространства.
[Новое Вооружение] Легендарная коса [Сказка Ундины] и набор стигмат [Дирак].

New features for v3.3
[New Battlesuit] Herrscher of Reason & Valkyrie Ranger Augmented
[New Events] Event: Valkyries Cast Away & free summer outfits!
[New Story] Story Chapter XI: EX Diane's Sojourn
[New Gear] Weapon Key of Reason & stigmata Welt Young

Особенности v3.1:
[Новые Валькирии] Близняшки Оленьевы
[Новый Ивент] Хонкаецарствие: Война Фракций
[Новая История] Звёздные Близняшки: Восходящие Звёзды Вселенной Хонкай
[Новый Боевой Костюм] Доступно Ядро Улучшения для Доспеха Ямабуки.
[Новое Вооружение] Двуручные мечи: Спящая Красавица и Лебединое Озеро

[Deep Enigma]
Theresa and her crew failed to locate the Herrscher of the Void. Anti-Entropy (AE) Enforcer Cocolia also brought some bad news: Schicksal is trying to take the Gem of Desire.
To protect the Gem, Theresa decided to head to [The Deep], a Previous Era ruin controlled by AE.
The mission to transfer the Gem will not be easy. The Valkyries will have to cope with an underwater environment, a Schicksal army in pursuit, and unknown enemies in the depths...
[Stalker: Phantom Iron]
Open your mind to this dark battlesuit. Unleash a blitz of iron upon your foes. Wield the dark scythe of doomsday and infect your foes with a virulent plague.
Rita's new battlesuit [Stalker: Phantom Iron] is now ready for deployment.

We've picked up the scent of our prey. Command: Kill!


[Argent Knight: Artemis]
The Goddess of Frost is armed with a razor-sharp scythe and imprisons evil in an eternal prison of ice.
Rita's S-rank battlesuit [Argent Knight: Artemis] is ready for battles!

Awake, Queen of Frost!


[ELF]
The powerful fluctuations of the Sea of Quanta have transformed Valkyrie weapons into Equipment: Living Form (ELFs)!
[Jingwei's Wings] and [Blood Embrace] are now ELFs with independent skill systems and autonomous combat styles! Deploy them quickly because they're really itching for battle!
[Break the Ceiling]
The Captain's level cap has been raised to better cope with the intensifying Honkai War!
Captains who ascended these new levels will be getting new adventure tasks, Path of Apotheosis tiers, and Divine Key skills.
Break the limit and sail to greater heights! The Hyperion can only be commandeered by the best!
